title: Introducing "Alpha Trader," A New Show From Seeking Alpha
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Alpha Trader is a weekly investor-focused podcast produced by Seeking Alpha that will dive into the most impactful market news and set the stage for upcoming market events. Hosted by Aaron Task and Stephen Alpher, episodes will be available every Tuesday, and will include discussions with market experts on topics relevant to active traders. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
